Accession	A0A494C0V5
EntryName	A0A494C0V5_HUMAN
ProteinName	Tafazzin family protein
GeneName	TAZ TAFAZZIN
Length	186
Function	Acyltransferase which is required to remodel newly synthesized phospholipid cardiolipin, a key component of the mitochondrial inner membrane. Required for the initiation of mitophagy. Required to ensure progression of spermatocytes through meiosis.
Subcellular Location	Mitochondrion inner membrane; Mitochondrion outer membrane
Disorder

Hydropathy
